actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to exempt from taxation certain property in the District of Columbia owned by the Washington Theater Club, Inc., and for other purposes.

summary.text: Exempts from taxation specified property in the District of Columbia owned by the Washington Theater Club, Incorporated.

titles.title: A bill to exempt from taxation certain property in the District of Columbia owned by the Washington Theater Club, Inc., and for other purposes.
